S04bsu014_u:2673: yatra sattva hīnacitta dīna mānaniratāstatra vidu śrāvakācarī deśeti vṛṣabhī /
S04bsu014_u:2674: yatra sattva tīkṣṇacitta pratyayānaniratāstatra jñāna pratyayāna darśayanti virajā // 10 //
S04bsu014_u:2678: ye tu sattva agra śreṣṭha matimānaniratāstatra amī buddhakāya darśayanti atulam // 11 //
S04bsu014_u:2680: māyā yathā māyakāro darśeti jagahite yāya koṭi naikavidyā sarvabhāvavigatā /
S04bsu014_u:2681: eva vidū buddhasutā jñānamāyaniratā darśayanti sarvacarī sarvabhāvavigatā // 12 //
S04bsu014_u:2682: etādṛśā rutasahasrān bhaṇitva madhurāṃstadā marukanyakā jinaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇīṃbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2683: parṣadviprasanneyamavocatsugatātmajam aṣṭamāyā bhaṇa ūrdhvaṃ cariṃ saddharmarājinām // 13 //
S04bsu014_u:2685: te apramāṇabalabuddhi vicārayantaḥ susūkṣmajñānaparamā jagatā durjñeyā /
S04bsu014_u:2686: tatha guhyasthāna sugatāna samosaranto bhūmiṃ kramanti navamīṃ jagato 'rthakarīm // 14 //
S04bsu014_u:2687: te dhāraṇīmukhi samādhisamāhitāgrā vipulā abhijñā api kṣetrapraveśanantam /
S04bsu014_u:2689: te atra bhūmyanugatā jinakośadhārī kuśalāśca dharmakuśalāśca avyākṛtāśca /
S04bsu014_u:2690: ye sāsravā api ca laukika ye ca āryāścintyā acintiya vidū anubuddhyayanti // 16 //
S04bsu014_u:2692: bhūmidharma yathā-adhimukti pracārataśca abhisaṃskaronti yatha lokya tathotaranti // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:2693: te evajñānanugatā varasūkṣmabuddhī sattvāna cittagahanaṃ parimārgayanti /
S04bsu014_u:2697: tatha karmapraveśa vicitravibhaktitaśca hetū niruddhaphalanāśa samotaranti // 19 //
S04bsu014_u:2699: indriya yā mṛdukamadhya udārataśca saṃbhedapūrvamaparānta samotaranti /
S04bsu014_u:2700: adhimukti naika vividhā śubha āśubhataśca catvāri āśīti sahasra samotaranti // 20 //
S04bsu014_u:2701: dhātūpraveśa jaga bhāvitakleśadṛṣṭī gahanaṃ gatā anavarāgra acchedataśca /
S04bsu014_u:2702: ye āśayā anuśayā sahajapracārī cittāsamosṛta nibaddha accheda tanti // 21 //
S04bsu014_u:2703: cittaṃ yathā anuśayā na ca dravyabhūto na ca deśasthā na ca vipravasanti āśayā /
S04bsu014_u:2704: durheya dhyānaviṣayānabhivartiyāśca chedaśca mārga vinayena na cānyamasti // 22 //
S04bsu014_u:2705: upapatti ṣaḍgati vibhaktipraveśataśca snehaṃ ca tṛṣṇamavidyāndhaka karmakṣetrā /
S04bsu014_u:2707: te vāsanāgati kileśa ca karma cittā suvihāratāya na punargatisanta kāmā /
S04bsu014_u:2709: evaṃ visaraṇagatāḥ sthita atra bhūmyāṃ sarvasattva āśaya yathendriya yādhimuktiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2710: teṣāmarthe dharmavibhakti prakāśayanti pratisaṃvidarthakuśalāḥ pratibhā nirukti // 25 //
S04bsu014_u:2713: abhipravarṣanti madhuramamṛtasya varṣaṃ bhujagendrasāgara yathā anupūrayanti // 26 //
S04bsu014_u:2715: te dhāraṇī daśa asaṃkhyasahasra labdhā dhāranti dharma yatha (sāgara varṣadhārī) // 27 //
S04bsu014_u:2716: evaṃ ca dhāraṇiviśuddhisamādhiprāptā ekakṣaṇena daśabuddhasahasra dṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2720: toṣenti sarva yathaindriya-āśayāśca catudvīpasāgara varṣā sama modayanti // 29 //
S04bsu014_u:2723: deśeyu dharma sugatāḥ puna nānasattvaṃ śrutvā dharema yatha sarvada (bījadhārī) // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:2724: (yāvatakā) jagadiha praviśanti sattvāḥ (te sarva ekapariṣanmaṇḍale niṣaṇṇāśca) /
S04bsu014_u:2725: eṣāṃ ca ekakṣaṇi sarvi samotaritvā ekāṃ rutena imi tarpayitavya sarve // 31 //
S04bsu014_u:2728: rātriṃdivaṃ sada jinaiḥ śamathānuprāptā gambhīra śānta sthita jñānavimokṣadhīrā // 32//
S04bsu014_u:2732: tasya kleśagahanāni prabhā samājya brahmaṇo va dvisahasrikalokadhātuḥ // 33 //
S04bsu014_u:2751: vastrakaiḥ samakarī sagauravā bhrāmayanti rucirān varān śatam // 3 //
S04bsu014_u:2752: apsarā bahava prīṇitendriyāḥ pūjayanti sugataṃ sagauravāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2754: ekakṣetra sugato niṣaṇṇakaḥ sarvakṣetri pratibhāsa darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:2756: ekaromu sugatasya raśmayo niścaranti jagakleśa śāmyati /
S04bsu014_u:2764: garbhaprāpta bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu jāyamāna kvaci kṣetra dṛśyate // 8 //
S04bsu014_u:2765: niṣkramanta jagahetu nāyako budhyamāna puna bodhimuttamām /
S04bsu014_u:2768: māyakāra yatha vidyaśikṣito jīvikārtha bahukāya darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:2772: yatha svabhāvu sugatānagocarā sarvasattva tatha prāpta dharmatām /
S04bsu014_u:2774: ye tu jñāna sugatāna arthiṃke kalpakalpaparikalpavarjitam /
S04bsu014_u:2777: marukanyā jinaṃ lokya tūṣṇībhūtāḥ śame ratāḥ // 14 //
S04bsu014_u:2782_0: atha khalu vajragarbho bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ vyavalokya
S04bsu014_u:2782_1: dharmadhātuṃ ca vyavalokayan sarvajñatācittotpādaṃ ca saṃvarṇayan bodhisattvaviṣayamādarśayan
S04bsu014_u:2782_4: evameva bhūmyarthaṃ prarūpayamāṇo buddhānubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:2786: khilamanavidhutānāṃ mārgajñāne sthitānāṃ śṛṇuta cariviśeṣān bodhisattvāna śreṣṭhān // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:2787: kuśalaśatasahasraṃ saṃciyā kalpakoṭyā buddhaśatasahasrān pūjayitvā maharṣīn /
S04bsu014_u:2791: yāva jina triyadhvā pūjanārthāya pūjaṃ khagapathapariṇāmaṃ śodhanaṃ sarvakṣetram /
S04bsu014_u:2792: samyaganugatārthe yāvatā sarvadharmān mokṣa jagata arthe jāyate bodhicittam // 20 //
S04bsu014_u:2799: pracalitaśubhakāryā dhīravīryotsahā ye nikhilajanahitārthe prodyayāmāna siṃhāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2801: avirataguṇasādhyā nirjitakleśasaṃghā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 24 //
S04bsu014_u:2803: śamasukhaniratā ye tyaktasaṃsārasaṅgā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 25//
S04bsu014_u:2805: jinapadaśaraṇasthā labdhatattvārthakā ye sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 26 //
S04bsu014_u:2807: sugataguṇasamīhā ye ca puṇyānurāgāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 27 //
S04bsu014_u:2808: tribhuvanahitakāmā bodhisaṃbhārapūrye praṇihitamanasā ye duṣkare 'pi caranti /
S04bsu014_u:2809: avirataśubhakarmaprodyatā bodhisattvāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 28 //
S04bsu014_u:2811: anugataśubhamārgā labdhadharmārthakāmā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 29 //
S04bsu014_u:2812: iti gaṇitaguṇāṃśā bodhicaryāścarantu jinapadapraṇidhānāḥ satsamṛddhiṃ labhantu /
S04bsu014_u:2813: triguṇapariviśuddhā bodhicittaṃ labhantu triśaraṇapariśuddhā bodhisattvā bhavantu // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:2886: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī // 65 //
S04bsu014_u:2895: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vijitya ca /
S04bsu014_u:2902: etāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsato nirdiṣṭāḥ sarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2903: tasyāṃ velāyāmayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
S04bsu014_u:2907_0: atha tasmin samaye bhagavāṃstān vimukticandrapramukhān sarvān bodhisattvānāmantrya
S04bsu014_u:2907_2: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā /
S04bsu014_u:2908: tadyūyaṃ sarve svayaṃ caivamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayata,
S04bsu014_u:2910: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuḥpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhitiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu014_u:2914: evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S04bsu014_u:2915_0: parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudāradharmasya
S04bsu014_u:2915_1: lābhinaḥ syuriti śraddhayā satkṛtya śrāvayiṣyanti śroṣyanti ca yoniśo manasi bhāvayiṣyanti ca /
S04bsu014_u:2916: pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati /
S04bsu014_u:2917: amātsaryacittatayā asya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā likhanāya vācanāya svādhyayanāya pūjanāya darśanāya dāsyati,
S04bsu014_u:2919: atha khalu bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayā anuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:2920: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā te 'rhantaḥ syuḥ śāriputreṇa tulyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2922: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuryādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2924: sarve 'pi pratyekajinā yadi syustān pūjayet kaścidihāpramattaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2927: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryāt praṇāmamapi caikavāram /
S04bsu014_u:2928: prasannacitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhan tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam // 4 //
S04bsu014_u:2929: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvāstān pūjayet yaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
S04bsu014_u:2930: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānuṣaiśca kalpānanekān bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // 5 //
S04bsu014_u:2931: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakāle tyaktvā svakāyaṃ ca tathātmajīvam /
S04bsu014_u:2932: dadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // 6 //
S04bsu014_u:2934: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicittam idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadātu // 7 //
S04bsu014_u:2936: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sa tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam // 8 //
S04bsu014_u:2937: prabhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantām ekaṃ padaṃ vādi śatīhayaśca /
S04bsu014_u:2938: na vyañjanād grasyati nāpi cārthād dadāti yaḥ sūtramidaṃ parebhyaḥ // 9 //
S04bsu014_u:2939: anuttarāsau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścit sadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
S04bsu014_u:2940: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate // 10 //
S04bsu014_u:2941: According the edition by Ryūkḥ Kondḥ (reproduced Kyoto 1983)
S04bsu014_u:2942: the end of the sūtra is:
S04bsu014_u:2943_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te vimukticandrapūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvagaṇā vaśavartidevarājapramukhāḥ
S04bsu014_u:2943_2: ca lokaḥ sā sarvāvatī parṣad bhagavato vajragarbhasya bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
S04bsu014_u:2945: iti śrībodhisattvacaryāprasthāno daśabhūmīśvaro nāma mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ //
S04bsu014_u:2946: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S04bsu014_u:2947: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
